text: Department of the Treasury Internal Revenue Service
This obsoletes IRM 21.7.8, “Business Tax Returns and Non-Master File Accounts - Excise Taxes.”

The material and all content in this IRM is being obsoleted concurrently and will be published with the publication of IRM 4.24.22 , Excise Tax, Campus Procedures for Excise Taxes as reﬂected in the table below:
IRM 21.7.8 dated 8/18/2017 is obsolete as of the date of this transmittal.
This IRM provides revised procedural guidance for employees assigned to resolve issues involving Business Master File (BMF) Excise Tax Returns.
